<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Frostbite Runes](/Feats.aspx?ID=3417) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 11</row>

**Archetype** [Pactbound Initiate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=167)

**Prerequisites**
[Pactbound Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3414)

</column>

---

Thick tattoos, each one a rune fragment from the saumen kar's long-lost language spelling out their pact with their equally lost deity, cover your body and stretch across your limbs, torso, and face. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64) and [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spells and effects. You can sense the presence of evil [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) as a pervasive taste of oily corruption in the air; this is a [vague](/Rules.aspx?ID=413) sense that allows you to know when such a creature is within 60 feet of you, though you can't precisely pinpoint their location with this sense. As normal for a vague sense, it can be fooled, but undead might not realize they need to take precautions against it. This sense also extends to living creatures who have the [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42) ability, like [dhampir](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=23).

 You deal an additional 1 cold damage with all Strikes made with an ice-crafted weapon. If you have the [Crown of the Saumen Kar](/Feats.aspx?ID=3416) feat, you deal an additional 1 cold damage with your unarmed horns Strikes.

<title level="2">Frostbite Runes leads to...</title>
[Bound in Ice](/Feats.aspx?ID=3419), [Curse of the Saumen Kar](/Feats.aspx?ID=3418)
name: Frostbite Runes
